content: this crochet pot scrubber pattern is super quick and easy to work up you can whip up several in no time and it is super practical the nylon fiber feels exactly like the wiry plastic scrubbies you can find at the store and works just as well super satisfying to find a project that is easy and cute and useful as well please note that there is an ad-free pdf version of this pattern available for purchase in my ravelry store to view the free version go to https //www caabcrochet com/crochet-pot-scrubber-pattern materials 20 yards size 4 lion brand stitch soak scrub yarn us h/ 5 0 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors gauge gauge is not necessary for this pattern sizing 3 ½ across and ¾ thick stitches used chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet
